backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user settings, public profiles, and experience data with queries for searching, filtering, and trending experiences.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying userProfiles and userSettings from an old actor state while dropping deprecated data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature metadata, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page bootstrapping the frontend with root div and main script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccountsDis: UI card prompting users to log in or sign up when accessing disabled or restricted features.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Authentication button group showing login/signup or logout depending on session state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Guard component requiring authentication and showing a login/signup prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/create/builder2d: Canvas component enabling element selection, dragging, and resizing with mouse event listeners tied to builder state updates.
Provides an image file picker that reads images as data URLs and adds them as decals via the builder.
Controls for moving the selected element forward/backward in layer order or deleting it.
Panel for adjusting position, opacity, rotation, color, and size of the currently selected element.
Manages saving, loading, exporting, importing, and deleting saved prop configurations for the 2D builder.
Buttons to add rectangle, circle, or triangle shapes to the builder canvas.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Crea: Button to follow or unfollow a creator with authentication and self-follow checks.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Expe: Displays an experience thumbnail, title, description, and creator info with navigation to its detail page.
Renders a grid of experience cards with loading skeletons and empty-state handling.
Thumbs-up and thumbs-down rating buttons for an experience with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/experiences/InGa: Provides an inâ€‘game menu with options to leave, reset the character, and open settings using dialogs and alerts.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Publ: Dialog form for publishing an experience, including title, description, category, controls, and optional thumbnail upload with progress.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, sidebar, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/AuthChang: Displays a banner announcing updated authentication behavior and restrictions.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Renders the left navigation sidebar with links to core user sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Site header with navigation, logo, auth buttons, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Shows a user's profile header with avatar, display name, and quick navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/social/Following: Lists followed creators with options to unfollow and loads creator details dynamically.
frontend/src/components/social/FriendsPa: UI panel for searching users, managing friends, and handling friend requests using social hooks and identity.
frontend/src/components/social/MessagesP: Messaging UI allowing user search, conversation selection, and sending messages with associated hooks.
frontend/src/components/social/PartiesPa: Placeholder UI card announcing an upcoming party/group system feature.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountSettings.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating user account settings such as display name, avatar, and visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilder2D.ts: Manages 2D builder state including elements, selection, transformations, layering, and canvas reset/load.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilder2DProps.ts: Handles saving, loading, exporting, and importing builder props via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Thin wrapper exposing current user and auth state from session auth.
frontend/src/hooks/useExperiences.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating experience data via the actor, with several backend methods still unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing identities, login, and initialization using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains generic React Query hooks for user profiles and experiences, many of which rely on placeholder or unimplemented backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionAuth.ts: Implements session-token-based auth flows with mock backend interactions, handling login, signup, and session validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFollowing.ts: Defines placeholder hooks for following creators, all currently disabled or throwing errors due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFriends.ts: Provides friend list and request management hooks using React Query, with all backend interactions still unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialMessages.ts: Offers messaging hooks for sending and fetching messages, but all calls return empty results or errors until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialParties.ts: Contains a placeholder hook for retrieving the current party, disabled pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDiscovery.ts: Implements a disabled user search hook returning empty results until backend session-based search is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, currently returning placeholders until backend session auth is implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind setup and CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarShop.tsx: Renders a placeholder Avatar Shop page with category cards and a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/pages/Create.tsx: Displays creation options and navigation cards for building games or UGC accessories.
Implements the 2D game builder layout with canvas, shape tools, layers, properties, and props panels.
Shows a coming-soon page for the UGC accessories creator with a back button and description.
frontend/src/pages/DiniBucks.tsx: Displays Dini Bucks info, balance access gated by authentication, and feature cards for earn/spend/trade/premium.
frontend/src/pages/Discover.tsx: A discovery page that supports searching, browsing by category, viewing trending experiences, and opening a publish dialog if authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ExperienceDetails.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single experience, including creator info, controls, and a play simulation with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Shows a groups landing page with a placeholder card indicating the user has not joined any groups yet.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard featuring recommended experiences, user welcome card, and friend activity section.
frontend/src/pages/Inventory.tsx: Inventory page showing a placeholder card when the user has no items.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login form handling username/password authentication with validation and error display.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page displaying user info, avatar, and navigation to edit profile or settings, wrapped in profile requirement logic.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: React settings page that loads user settings, allows updating profile data, avatar, visibility, and handles error/loading states with various mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: User signup form handling validation, account creation, and navigation after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/Social.tsx: Authenticated social hub page with tabbed panels for friends, messages, parties, and following.
frontend/src/utils/formatError.ts: Utility that converts unknown error values into readable message strings for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/sessionToken.ts: Helpers for storing, retrieving, and clearing the session token in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requests for backend settings fixes and improved error reporting.
